FROM 50E SGF-70WSW FAM-30NW ARG-60WNW ARG-50E SGF 
AREA TS MOV FROM 24035KT. TOPS TO FL280. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 242255-250255 
AREA 1...FROM 30SW COU-50SSE IIU-MCN-170W PIE-130ESE LEV-50SSW 
LEV-40W LEV-90ESE PSX-30NE PSX-30W IGB-40SSE LIT-30SW COU 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40SSW GLD-30ENE GCK-LBL-40E TBE-40SSW GLD 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

WSUS04 KKCI 242032 
DFWW WS 242032 
SIGMET WHISKEY 2 VALID UNTIL 250032 
SIGMET  
TN MS AL IN KY OH VA NC GA 
FROM ROD TO HMV TO ATL TO IGB TO TTH TO ROD 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL180 AND FL340. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH
